1112916389625565184.text:
1. People who would rather have a dead child than a child with autism should not have the right to decide if their child should be vaccinated or not
2. You promote “choosing life” then promote actively exposing kids to preventable deadly diseases? I’m confusedhttps://twitter.com/realDonaldTrump/status/449525268529815552 …

1112917810047565825.text: Since everyone keeps sharing this dumbass post can I please share that this is from 2014!!!! Before all sorts of research and scientific studies were done. People just try to go back and share Trumps tweets to drag him.

1113133210370752519.text: Vaccinations do work and are needed. Can’t understand why liberals are letting thousands of unvaccinated migrants into the country. If your taking medical advice from Trump then you deserve what you get.

1112923840655618048.text: Sadly this dumbass post is still relevant today. My opinions on vaccinations don’t have much to do with Trump, while it is sad he spoke while so uninformed. His intolerance for people with disabilities however, has not seemed to change over the years.

1113061106388553728.text: We knew vaccines were important and effective way before 2014. He just chooses to believe in conspiracy theories.

1113061582215372805.text: We have valid longstanding research on climate change and he refuses to believe that too even in 2019.
